title: Hooligan
synopsis: Five girls. One guy. Seven Holy Dildos. It all started when our hero, Yukito, was trying to score with his favorite blond bombshell, Olga. Things were just heating up when one of her science experiments exploded, and it screwed up all of time and space. Now, only one thing can save the world: the Seven Holy Dildos!
characters: ['Olga, Mengele', 'Tougou, Hiromi', 'Victoria, Nelson', 'Margret, Artoua', 'Isao', 'Nogi, Yukito', 'Amou, Yuki', 'Amou, Yuka']
